blocks.name: gsummptnn0fz
blocks.content: A final group sum over a function over the nonnegative integers (given as mapping) is equal to a final group sum over a finite interval of nonnegative integers. (Contributed by AV, 10-Oct-2019.) (Revised by AV, 3-Jul-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsummptnn0fz(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, cn0, c1)), co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c2), c1))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, ccmn))
  -| wi(w0, wral(s0, cn0, wcel(c1, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cn0))
  -| wi(w0, wral(s0, cn0, wi(wbr(c2, clt, cv(s0)), wceq(c1, c4))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  mpd(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, cn0, c1)), co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c2), c1))), wral(hs0, cn0, wi(wbr(c2, clt, cv(hs0)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, cn0, c1), cv(hs0)), c4))))
  mpd(w0, wral(hs0, cn0, wi(wbr(c2, clt, cv(hs0)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, cn0, c1), cv(hs0)), c4))), wral(hs0, cn0, wi(wbr(c2, clt, cv(hs0)), wceq(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), c4))))

blocks.content: A final group sum over a function over the nonnegative integers (given as mapping to its function values) is equal to a final group sum over a finite interval of nonnegative integers. (Contributed by AV, 10-Oct-2019.)

thm gsummptnn0fzfv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {

  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, cn0, cfv(c1, cv(s0)))), co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, co(nat0, cfz, c2), cfv(c1, cv(s0)))))), diffsw(s1, w0))
  gsummptnn0fz(s0, c0, cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c2, c3, c4, w0)

  3syl(w0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), cn0), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c3)), wcel(c1, co(c3, cmap, cn0)), wf(c1, cn0, c3))
  elmapi(c1, c3, cn0)

  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wbr(c2, clt, cv(s1)), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), c4), wbr(c2, clt, cv(s0)), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), c4))

blocks.name: telgsumfz
blocks.content: Telescoping group sum ranging over a finite set of sequential integers, using implicit substitution, analogous to ~ telfsum . (Contributed by AV, 23-Nov-2019.)

thm telgsumfz(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, co(c1, cfz, c2), co(c3, c4, c5))), co(c6, c4, c7)))
  -| wceq(c8, cfv(cbs, c0))

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(cuz, c1)))

  -| diffsc(s1, c7)
  -| diffsc(s1, c8)

  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  3eqtrd(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, co(c1, cfz, c2), co(c3, c4, c5))), co(c6, c4, c7), co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, co(c1, cfz, c2), co(csb(s1, cv(s0), c9), c4, csb(s1, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), c9)))), co(csb(s1, c1, c9), c4, csb(s1, co(c2, caddc, nat1), c9)), w0)

  oveq12d(c3, c4, c5, csb(s1, cv(s0), c9), csb(s1, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), c9), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cfz, c2))))
  eqcomd(c3, csb(s1, cv(s0), c9), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cfz, c2))))
  csbied(s1, cv(s0), c9, c3, co(c1, cfz, c2), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cfz, c2))))

thm telgsumfz(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[gsum](s0 ∈(c1[...]c2)↦(c3[c4]c5)))=(c6[c4]c7))
  ⊣ c8 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Abel)
  ⊣ c4 =(-g ` c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c1))
  ⊣ (w0 → ∀(s1 ∈(c1[...](c2[+]1)), c9 ∈ c8))
  ⊣ (s1 = s0 → c9 = c3)
  ⊣ (s1 =(s0[+]1)→ c9 = c5)
  ⊣ (s1 = c1 → c9 = c6)

blocks.name: telgsum
blocks.content: Telescoping finitely supported group sum ranging over nonnegative integers, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by AV, 31-Dec-2019.)

thm telgsum(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, cn0, co(c1, c2, c3))), c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cabl))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(csg, c0))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wral(s1, cn0, wcel(c7, c5)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c8, cn0))
  -| wi(w0, wral(s1, cn0, wi(wbr(c8, clt, cv(s1)), wceq(c7, c6))))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wceq(c7, c1))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), wceq(c7, c3))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), nat0), wceq(c7, c4))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)
  -| diffsc(s0, c8)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c8)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  3eqtrd(co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, cn0, co(c1, c2, c3))), c4, co(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, cn0, co(csb(s1, cv(s0), c7), c2, csb(s1, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), c7)))), csb(s1, nat0, c7), w0)
  oveq2d(c0, cgsu, cmpt(s0, cn0, co(c1, c2, c3)), cmpt(s0, cn0, co(csb(s1, cv(s0), c7), c2, csb(s1, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), c7))), w0)
  mpteq2dva(s0, cn0, co(c1, c2, c3), co(csb(s1, cv(s0), c7), c2, csb(s1, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), c7)), w0)
  oveq12d(c1, c2, c3, csb(s1, cv(s0), c7), csb(s1, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), c7), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn0)))
  eqcomd(c1, csb(s1, cv(s0), c7), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn0)))
  csbied(s1, cv(s0), c7, c1, cn0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn0)))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn0))
  adantl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wceq(c7, c1))
  eqcomd(c3, csb(s1, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), c7), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn0)))
  csbied(s1, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), c7, c3, cn0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn0)))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn0), wcel(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), cn0))
  peano2nn0(cv(s0))
  adantl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn0)), wceq(cv(s1), co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), wceq(c7, c3))
  telgsums(s0, s1, c0, c7, c2, c5, c6, c8, w0)
  csbied(s1, nat0, c7, c4, universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, wcel(nat0, universe))
  c0ex()
  adantl(w0, wceq(cv(s1), nat0), wceq(c7, c4))
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, wcel(cv(s0), cn0))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), cn0)
  diff.cn0.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, cv(s0), caddc, nat1)

blocks.pretty:
thm telgsum(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[gsum](s0 ∈ ℕ0 ↦(c1[c2]c3)))= c4)
  ⊣ c5 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Abel)
  ⊣ c2 =(-g ` c0)
  ⊣ c6 =(0 ` c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → ∀(s1 ∈ ℕ0, c7 ∈ c5))
  ⊣ (w0 → c8 ∈ ℕ0)
  ⊣ (w0 → ∀(s1 ∈ ℕ0,(c8[<]s1 → c7 = c6)))
  ⊣ (s1 = s0 → c7 = c1)
  ⊣ (s1 =(s0[+]1)→ c7 = c3)
  ⊣ (s1 = 0 → c7 = c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, c6)
  ⊣ d(s0, c7)
  ⊣ d(s0, c8)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c5)
  ⊣ d(s1, c6)
  ⊣ d(s1, c8)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  3eqtrd((c0[gsum](s0 ∈ ℕ0 ↦(c1[c2]c3))), c4, (c0[gsum](s0 ∈ ℕ0 ↦([s0 / s1]c7[c2][(s0[+]1)/ s1]c7))), [0 / s1]c7, w0)
  oveq2d(c0, cgsu, (s0 ∈ ℕ0 ↦(c1[c2]c3)), (s0 ∈ ℕ0 ↦([s0 / s1]c7[c2][(s0[+]1)/ s1]c7)), w0)
  mpteq2dva(s0, cn0, (c1[c2]c3), ([s0 / s1]c7[c2][(s0[+]1)/ s1]c7), w0)
  oveq12d(c1, c2, c3, [s0 / s1]c7, [(s0[+]1)/ s1]c7, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℕ0))
  eqcomd(c1, [s0 / s1]c7, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℕ0))
  csbied(s1, s0, c7, c1, cn0, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℕ0))
  simpr(w0, s0 ∈ ℕ0)
  adantl((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℕ0), s1 = s0, c7 = c1)
  eqcomd(c3, [(s0[+]1)/ s1]c7, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℕ0))
  csbied(s1, (s0[+]1), c7, c3, cn0, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℕ0))
  adantl(w0, s0 ∈ ℕ0, (s0[+]1)∈ ℕ0)
  peano2nn0(s0)
  adantl((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ ℕ0), s1 =(s0[+]1), c7 = c3)
  telgsums(s0, s1, c0, c7, c2, c5, c6, c8, w0)
  csbied(s1, nat0, c7, c4, universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, 0 ∈ 𝕌)
  c0ex()
  adantl(w0, s1 = 0, c7 = c4)
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, s0 ∈ ℕ0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, cn0)
  diff.cn0.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, s0, caddc, nat1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.caddc.s(s1)
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
  diff.nat0.s(s1)
}
